Author: GitHub
Title: The new role of the developer in the AI era
Description:
How is the developer's relationship with AI evolving? Eirini Kalliamvakou explains that as developers experiment more with AI, fear is turning into optimism. The role is shifting from purely writing code to acting as a "creative director," managing implementation and focusing on higher-level problem solving.

#Developer #AI #Coding
